title: USB Builder Pack (FBB)
description:
Pack of Useful USB stuff 

In the Pack:



Safely remove hardware - just a shortcut I made that invokes "Safely remove hardware" put it on the key use it just before you quit the keys menu ,quit the key menu and "Safely Remove Hardware" will still be on yer desktop until you closed and remove it.

USBSafelyRemove V3.0.13.451 - replaces "Safely Remove Hardware" - this stops all connected programs to the USB key allowing u to safely remove ANY usb device. 'Self Contained Program' (SCP) (Doesn't add anything to the host machine)

Simple USB Format Utility - Small and works well on standard USB keys (SCP)

HP USB Format Utility - an installable Formating Utility for USB keys

PeToUSB - Formatting Utility which u can make a 'bootable key' with (not all keys are capable of booting)

U3 Uninstall - For those annoying U3 keys that have a CDFS partion on them and tell Windows they're a CD and a HD - N.B one way ticket, once the CDFS is removed its hard to impossible to get it back. I have used this on 2 of my keys , it works great!

Some MHTML(all in HTML) Info that will definately help.

ThinAPP4 - Use to make portable programmes Plus Serials if you need them
Simple Instructions for ThinApp4

Your Uninstaller plus Keygen (last edition) good to clean up after a ThinApp build
  
MS Virtual Machine 2007 SP1 - Installer
